body_html: Hi thuyen, thank you for catching this subtle issue, as well as the detailed explanation! After the merge, I think we can still have your changes on the fix (adding is_training to the gradient op) and the data_format support for bias_add in your pull request #4892
body_text: Hi thuyen, thank you for catching this subtle issue, as well as the detailed explanation! After the merge, I think we can still have your changes on the fix (adding is_training to the gradient op) and the data_format support for bias_add in your pull request #4892
body: Hi thuyen, thank you for catching this subtle issue, as well as the detailed explanation! After the merge, I think we can still have your changes on the fix (adding is_training to the gradient op) and the data_format support for bias_add in your pull request #4892
